trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> A hapless miner is having difficulty paying his tab.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_TODO_00<tab>Use the safety lamp south of Twine.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the sparkling gemstone.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_TODO_02<tab>Give the safety lamp and sparkling gemstone to the hapless miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_COLLECTION03497_000_000<tab>No more excuses! You'll not get another drop until you pay your tab!
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_010<tab>But the gemstone I was gonna give you, I lost it on the way back from the mine! It was right there in my hands, I swear!
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_COLLECTION03497_000_011<tab>Then how'd you end up losing it? I don't care what you dug up, it won't be paying off your tab while it's sitting in some ditch.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_012<tab>I ain't makin' it up, honest!
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_013<tab>Ah, you there! You don't look the sort to turn your back on a man who's down on his luck. Help me find it, would you?
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_014<tab>Here, take this lantern. The gemstone'll glint when the light hits it. Bring it to me, and I'll...errr, think of some way to pay you back!
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_020<tab>I've tried lookin' meself, but no joy. Why does nothin' ever go my way!?
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_COLLECTION03497_000_021<tab>You must be a fool to let yourself be caught up in one of his schemes. I don't think a true word's ever come out of his mouth.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Something is glimmering in the light of the lantern!
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_SYSTEM_100_030<tab>It seems the gemstone you seek is elsewhere.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_040<tab>Did you find it!?
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_041<tab>It's a miracle!
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_042<tab>Ahem! I think this should cover it.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_COLLECTION03497_000_043<tab>It certainly does. But from now on, you'll pay up front for every drink. No more tabs!

TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_044<tab>I wonder if I'll be able to find any more stones like that? Folk at the Crystarium use them as lenses in some sort of magical cannons, so they sell for a hefty price.
TEXT_LUCKZG012_03497_MINER03497_000_045<tab>If I manage to dig any more up, I'll take care not to drop 'em! Next time, I might not have someone like you around to help me! Many thanks to you, friend!
